src:
Haaland satte ny rekord i Champions League: ‚Äì Jeg lever dr√∏mmen
Brennhete Erling Braut Haaland (19) scoret sitt syvende m√•l p√• fire kamper i Champions League borte mot Napoli.
05 Nov 2019, 21:46 by Sondre Moen Myhre

Napoli ‚Äì Red Bull Salzburg 1‚Äì1.

Det store sp√∏rsm√•let f√∏r tirsdagens runde i Champions League var: Kunne Erling Braut Haaland fortsette sin scoringsform i turneringen?
Svar fikk man allerede etter elleve minutter p√• Stadio San Paolo i Napoli.
Da hadde Kalidou Koulibaly p√• ulovlig vis stanset Hwang Hee-chan innenfor Napolis sekstenmeter. Raskt plukket Haaland opp ballen, som for √• signalisere til lagkameratene at ¬´denne tar jeg¬ª.
Ett skritt. To skritt. Tre skritt. Stoppe opp. Pang.
‚Äì Det er s√•nn som jeg gjorde det i Molde. Jeg bare tar det videre til en st√∏rre arena. Det gikk fint det, sa Haaland til Viasat etter kampen.
P√• lekkert vis sendte 19-√•ringen Napoli-m√•lvakt Alex Meret til venstre og ballen iskaldt til h√∏yre inn i nettet.
‚Äì Du s√• hvor tidlig han gikk, s√• da var det bare √• sette den motsatt. S√• enkelt var det, forklarte han.
‚Äì Han er et m√•lmonster uten like. Det er helt utrolig. Den straffen han setter er s√• breial og fin. Han er helt suveren, sa TV 2s fotballekspert Simen Stams√∏ M√∏ller.

Fakta: Champions League menn tirsdag, 4. runde:

Gruppe E:



Liverpool ‚Äì Genk 2-1 (1-1)


M√•l: 1-0 Georginio Wijnaldum (14), 1-1 Mbwana Samatta (40), 2-1 Alex Oxlade-Chamberlain (53).


Napoli ‚Äì Salzburg 1-1 (1-1)


M√•l: 0-1 Erling Braut Haaland (str. 11), 1-1 Hirving Lozano (44).

Gruppe F:



Barcelona ‚Äì Slavia Praha 0-0 (0-0)




Borussia Dortmund ‚Äì Inter 3-2 (0-2)


M√•l: 0-1 Lautaro Mart√≠nez (5), 0-2 Mat√≠as Vecino (40), 1-2 Achraf Hakimi (51), 2-2 Julian Brandt (64), 3-2 Hakimi (77).

Gruppe G:



Zenit St. Petersburg ‚Äì RB Leipzig 0-2 (0-1)


M√•l: 0-1 Diego Demme (45), 0-2 Marcel Sabitzer (63).


Lyon ‚Äì Benfica 3-1 (2-0)


M√•l: 1-0 Joachim Andersen (4), 2-0 Memphis Depay (33), 2-1 Haris Seferoviƒá (76), 3-1 Bertrand Traor√© (89).

Gruppe H:



Chelsea ‚Äì Ajax 4-4 (1-3)


M√•l: 0-1 Tammy Abraham (selvm√•l 2), 1-1 Jorginho (str. 4), 1-2 Quincy Promes (20), 1-3 Kepa (selvm√•l 35), 1-4 Donny van de Beek (55), 2-4 C√©sar Azpilicueta (63), 3-4 Jorginho (str. 71), 4-4 Reece James (74).


Valencia ‚Äì Lille 4-1 (0-1)


M√•l: 0-1 Victor Osimhen (25), 1-1 Dani Parejo (str. 66), 2-1 Adama Soumaoro (selvm√•l 82), 3-1 Geoffrey Kondogbia (84), 4-1 Ferran Torres (90).


Haalands trener avsl√∏rte interesse fra storklubb



Haaland gratuleres av lagkameratene etter sin syvende scoring p√• fire kamper i Champions League.üì∑ CIRO DE LUCA / Reuters

Rekord p√• rekord
Haalands syvende m√•l p√• fire kamper gjorde at statistikkjegere og journalister nok en gang m√•tte dykke ned dypt ned i Champions League-historikken for √• fors√∏ke √• finne noe som er sammenlignbart med prestasjonen til m√•lmaskinen fra J√¶ren.

Den viser at Haaland n√• har brutt flere nye barrierer:


Haalands syv scoringer p√• fire kamper er to flere enn noen annen spiller har klart p√• like mange kamper.
Haaland har n√• g√•tt forbi Real Madrid-legenden Raul og PSGs Kylian Mbapp√© p√• listen over ten√•ringer med flest scoringer i en og samme Champions League-sesong.
Haaland er den fjerde spilleren i historien med scoring i de fire f√∏rste opptredenene i turneringen. De andre er: Z√© Carlos (FC Porto, 1992/93), Alessandro Del Piero (Juventus, 1995) og Diego Costa (Atl√©tico Madrid, 2013/14).

‚Äì Jeg lever dr√∏mmen, s√• det gjelder √• kose seg, sa Haaland om rekordene og hvordan han holder seg s√• rolig.



Lagerb√§ck mener han er mer enn bare m√•l
Tidligere tirsdag ble naturlig nok Haaland tatt ut i den norske troppen som skal m√∏te F√¶r√∏yene og Malta i de to siste kampene av EM-kvalifiseringen.
P√• pressekonferansen fikk landslagssjef Lars Lagerb√§ck sp√∏rsm√•l om hva han syntes om prestasjonene denne h√∏sten.
‚Äì Det g√•r ikke an √• si noe annet enn ¬´bra¬ª. Det har bare braket l√∏s, sa han p√• sedvanlig rolig vis.
Landslagssjefen var ogs√• opptatt av at Haaland ikke kun bidrar med m√•l p√• lagene han spiller p√•.
‚Äì Det er en fantastisk rekke med m√•l han har og samtidig er han bra i spillet, fortsatte han.

Haaland tilbake i landslagstroppen ‚Äì dette sier Lagerb√§ck om √òdegaard



I landskampene mot F√¶r√∏yene og Malta i midten av november f√•r Haaland muligheten til √• score sitt f√∏rste m√•l p√• A-landslaget.üì∑ Stian Lysberg Solum/NTB scanpix

Offside?
Selv om Haaland fortsetter √• b√∏tte inn m√•l for Salzburg, s√• fortsetter ogs√• laget √• lekke som en sil bakover i Champions League.
Like f√∏r pause utlignet Napoli ved Hirving Lozano. Men det store sp√∏rsm√•let var om han sto i offside da han mottok ballen.
‚Äì Ja, mente Viasat-ekspert Lars Tjern√•s.
‚Äì Nei, mente dommerne i VAR-rommet.
Ut ifra bildene kunne det se ut som om Tjern√•s hadde rett, men likevel ble scoringen godkjent til Salzburgs store frustrasjon.
Et uavgjortresultat betyr at Salzburg har en formidabel oppgave foran seg de to neste kampene mot Liverpool og Genk for √• ta igjen forspranget til Napoli og Liverpool p√• henholdsvis fire og fem poeng.
‚Äì Vi f√•r bare ta kamp for kamp. Det blir i hvert fall en voldsom kamp mot ¬´Sandy¬ª (Sander Berge, journ.anm.) i Genk n√•. S√• tror jeg vi f√•r en veldig god kamp mot Liverpool.
Blir det en tredjeplass i gruppen, blir det likevel mer fotball ute i Europa p√• Haaland og Salzburg: Da g√•r de inn i sluttspillet av Europaligaen.

Kilder: Opta og ESPN


Haaland vekker internasjonal oppsikt: ¬´Sensasjonen alle snakker om¬ª
text:
Haaland set a new record in the Champions League: - I live the dream
Brennhete Erling Braut Haaland (19) scored his seventh goal in four Champions League away games against Naples.
05 Nov 2019, 21:46 by Sondre Moen Myhre

Naples - Red Bull Salzburg 1-1.

The big question before Tuesday's round of the Champions League was: Could Erling Braut Haaland continue his scoring form in the tournament?
An answer was already given after eleven minutes at the Stadio San Paolo in Naples.
Then Kalidou Koulibaly had illegally stopped Hwang Hee-chan within Naples sixteen meters. Haaland quickly picked up the ball, as if to signal to his teammates that "this one I take".
One step. Two steps. Three steps. Stop. Pang.
- That's how I did it in Molde. I'm just taking it to a bigger arena. That went well, Haaland told Viasat after the match.
Deliciously, 19-year-old Napoli goalkeeper Alex Meret sent left and the ball freeze to the right into the net.
- You saw how early he went, so then it was just the opposite. It was that simple, he explained.
- He is a target monster without equal. It is completely incredible. The punishment he puts is so broad and fine. He is absolutely superb, said TV 2's football expert Simen Stams√∏ M√∏ller.

Facts: Men's Champions League Tuesday, Round 4:

Group E:



Liverpool - Genk 2-1 (1-1)


Goals: 1-0 Georginio Wijnaldum (14), 1-1 Mbwana Samatta (40), 2-1 Alex Oxlade-Chamberlain (53).


Naples - Salzburg 1-1 (1-1)


Goals: 0-1 Erling Braut Haaland (size 11), 1-1 Hirving Lozano (44).

Group F:



Barcelona - Slavia Praha 0-0 (0-0)




Borussia Dortmund - Inter 3-2 (0-2)


Goals: 0-1 Lautaro Mart√≠nez (5), 0-2 Mat√≠as Vecino (40), 1-2 Achraf Hakimi (51), 2-2 Julian Brandt (64), 3-2 Hakimi (77).

Group G:



Zenit St. Petersburg - RB Leipzig 0-2 (0-1)


Goals: 0-1 Diego Demme (45), 0-2 Marcel Sabitzer (63).


Lyon - Benfica 3-1 (2-0)


Goals: 1-0 Joachim Andersen (4), 2-0 Memphis Depay (33), 2-1 Haris Seferoviƒá (76), 3-1 Bertrand Traor√© (89).

Group H:



Chelsea - Ajax 4-4 (1-3)


Goals: 0-1 Tammy Abraham (goal 2), 1-1 Jorginho (size 4), 1-2 Quincy Promes (20), 1-3 Kepa (goal 35), 1-4 Donny van de Beek (55) , 2-4 C√©sar Azpilicueta (63), 3-4 Jorginho (str. 71), 4-4 Reece James (74).


Valencia - Small 4-1 (0-1)


Goals: 0-1 Victor Osimhen (25), 1-1 Dani Parejo (size 66), 2-1 Adama Soumaoro (goal 82), 3-1 Geoffrey Kondogbia (84), 4-1 Ferran Torres (90).


Haaland's coach revealed interest from a major club



Haaland is congratulated by his teammates after his seventh scoring four games in the Champions League.üì∑ CIRO DE LUCA / Reuters

Record on record
Haaland's seventh goal in four games meant that statistics hunters and journalists once again had to dive deep into Champions League history to try to find something comparable to the performance of the goalie from J√¶ren.

It shows that Haaland has now broken several new barriers:


Haaland's seven scores in four games are two more than any other player has managed in just as many matches.
Haaland has now passed Real Madrid legend Raul and PSG's Kylian Mbapp√© on the list of teenagers with the most scores in a single Champions League season.
Haaland is the fourth player in history to score in the first four appearances of the tournament. The others are: Z√© Carlos (FC Porto, 1992/93), Alessandro Del Piero (Juventus, 1995) and Diego Costa (Atl√©tico Madrid, 2013/14).

"I live the dream, so it's fun to have fun," Haaland said of the records and how he stays so calm.



Lagerb√§ck believes he is more than just a target
Earlier Tuesday, naturally, Haaland was taken out in the Norwegian squad to meet the Faroe Islands and Malta in the last two matches of the European Championship qualifier.
At the press conference, national team manager Lars Lagerb√§ck was asked what he thought about the performance this fall.
- It is impossible to say anything other than "good". It just broke loose, he said in the usual calm way.
The national team manager was also keen on Haaland not only contributing goals on the teams he plays on.
- There is a fantastic range of goals he has and at the same time he is good at the game, he continued.

Haaland back in the national team - this is what Lagerb√§ck says about √òdegaard



In the international matches against the Faroe Islands and Malta in mid-November, Haaland will have the opportunity to score his first goal on the national team. üì∑ Stian Lysberg Solum / NTB scanpix

Offside?
Although Haaland continues to push in goals for Salzburg, the team also continues to leak as a sieve back in the Champions League.
Just before the break, Naples equalized by Hirving Lozano. But the big question was whether he was offside when he received the ball.
- Yes, said Viasat expert Lars Tjern√•s.
- No, the judges in the VAR room felt.
From the pictures it might look like Tjern√•s was right, but still the score was approved to Salzburg's great frustration.
A draw result means Salzburg has a formidable task ahead of the next two games against Liverpool and Genk to take the lead to Naples and Liverpool at four and five points respectively.
- We just have to fight for battle. At least it will be a fierce battle against "Sandy" (Sander Berge, journ. Note) in Genk now. Then I think we will have a very good match against Liverpool.
If there is a third place in the group, there will still be more football in Europe at Haaland and Salzburg: Then they enter the playoffs of the Europa League.

Sources: Record and ESPN


Haaland raises international awareness: "The sensation everyone is talking about"
